column1: Ain't No Woman (Like the One I've Got) - Wikipedia
column3: Karkoszki [karˈkɔʂki] is a village in the administrative district of Gmina Gomunice
column6: in central Poland.[1] It lies approximately 3 kilometres (2 mi) south of Gomunice
column8: and 72 km (45 mi) south of the regional capital Łódź.
